name: Creepin Sim - Boss Fight Edition
description:
Creepin Sim : Boss Fight Edition  is a hollow knight fan game  that    gives you the opportunity to rediscover certains of the iconic bosses  of Hallownest under a new, amusing and funny, light :

What if the knight could talk ?    

What if you could out creep the creepers ?  

What if you wanted to be part of the troupe ? 

12 roads to discover for 6 boss fight  re-invented to answer those questions and some more ! 

Wishing you a fun time  !

hollow knight (characters, music and wonderful world )  belongs to    Team Cherry

creepin sim (drawings, scenario and realisation) belongs to    Lapaduza
